1371: Poppo was born in Helle voet in 1371.
1372: Lost mother at the age of 1 in childbirth.
Lost mother at the age of 1.
Geraldus took care of Poppo since Poppo was 2.
1375: Lost father at the age of 4.
Left Helle voet.B.0 for lack of a breadwinner.
Went to live in the orphanage at age 5.
1388: Poppo moved to St. Joris straet.A.4 in 1388.
Left orphanage at the age of 18.
1389: Got married to Flore at age 19 in 1389.
Had Flore move in at St. Joris straet.A.4 after marriage.
1392: Had a daughter with Flore, Flore, at age 21.
1395: Had a daughter with Flore, Hadewigis, at age 24.
